summary: A class modeling the IEEE 802.1Q/802.1ad VLAN tag header, encapsulating fields such as priority code point, drop‑eligible indicator, TPID, and VLAN identifier, with convenient accessors and mutators for each field.
business_intent: Enable networking applications to construct, read, and modify Ethernet frames that carry VLAN tags, supporting QoS classification, traffic segregation, and protocol‑compliant packet processing in switches, routers, virtual switches, and other network functions.
